remarks: A subspace included in a 1-dim subspace belongs to the range of isomorphism H. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dih1dor0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dih1dor0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihldor0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.

dih1dor0.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dih1dor0.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihlspsnssN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. V /\ T C_ ( N ` { X } ) ) -> ( T e. S <-> T e. ran I ) ) $.
